DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety effectiveness Zeltiq System LipoSonix System fat reduction improve body shape .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Testing Noninvasive Cryolipolysis Device Versus High Intensity Focused Ultrasound Device Fat Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: At baseline visit , subject meet inclusion exclusion criterion enrol . Subjects randomly assign receive Zeltiq treatment either right leave flank The contralateral flank receive Liposonix treatment . A total three identical treatment complete monthly 3 consecutive month . Subjects return 4 week follow last treatment follow photography , measurement , assessment . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
